resources.string: Sign in with your Google Account

"This account has been disabled.
(For details, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts.)"

"Your username and password do not match. Please try again.
(To recover your account information, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts.)"
For security reasons, please enter the word displayed above

"Congratulations! Your Android is now linked to the Google Account
%s."
Back up data with my Google Account
"Your Google and some third-party applications' settings and other data (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) can be backed up to Google's servers, with your Google Account."
